gjs-html:
Your Cart is waiting for you!

Hey {{billing_address.first_name}},

We noticed that there were some items left in your shopping cart. We've saved your cart for you. Complete your order now!
Complete your purchase

Item

Description

Cost

{% for line in line_items %}{% capture product_attributes %}{% for p in line.properties %}{% unless p.last==blank or p.first contains '_options' %}
{{p.first}}:{{p.last}}{% endunless %}{% endfor %}{% endcapture %}
{{line.title}} x {{line.quantity}} {{product_attributes}} {{line.line_price | money}}
{% endfor %}

Your discount coupon

As a way of saying thanks for shopping with us, here is a discount code for 10% off your next purchase within the next two weeks.

{{retainful_coupon}}
SHOP NOW!

Please do not hesitate to get in contact if you have any questions.

Best,
Team Your Shop Name

@ {{shop.name}} | {{shop.address}}

If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to us.

If you don't want to receive any future emails  unsubscribe here

gjs-css: * { box-sizing: border-box; } body {margin: 0;}#imrh{name:Lato;href:https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Lato:400,700;id:imrh;}#ih3l{name:Oswald;href:https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Oswald:500,600,700;id:ih3l;}#iq561w{padding-bottom:20px;id:iq561w;background-color:#ffffff;}#iei4j{src:https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/retainful/emailCustomizer@0.1.9/images/your-logo.png;id:iei4j;width:100%;}#ii1oeh{background-color:#FFFFFF;id:ii1oeh;padding-bottom:0;padding-top:20px;border-top:3px solid #6171e1;border-right:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-left:1px solid #e5e5e5;}#ijvr12-2{border-radius:1px 0 0 0;id:ijvr12-2;}#ip8trd{color:#333333;font-size:28px;font-weight:600;font-family:Oswald, Helvetica, sans-serif;line-height:2.7rem;align:center;id:ip8trd;padding-bottom:0;padding-top:0;text-transform:uppercase;}#ii1oeh-2{background-color:#FFFFFF;id:ii1oeh-2;padding-bottom:0px;padding-top:0;border-right:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-left:1px solid #e5e5e5;}#iz5l57{background-color:#FFF;border-right:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-left:1px solid #e5e5e5;id:iz5l57;padding-top:0;border-bottom:1px none rgb(0, 0, 0);}#iw93j3{color:#333;font-size:16px;font-weight:500;line-height:2;font-family:Lato, Helvetica, sans-serif;id:iw93j3;padding-bottom:0;padding-top:0;}#ivizi{background-color:#6171e1;href:{{abandoned_checkout_url}};font-family:Oswald, Helvetica,
